org.cougaar.core.service
Interface IncarnationService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
public interface IncarnationService
extends Service

This service tracks agent incarnation numbers, which are updated every time the agent restarts (excluding agent mobility).

This is used to detect restarted agents and reconcile with them.

Nested Class Summary

          Subscription callback API.

Method Detail

getIncarnation

long getIncarnation(MessageAddress addr)
Returns:
the agent incarnation, or -1 if the agent or its incarnation is not known.

updateIncarnation

int updateIncarnation(MessageAddress addr,
                      long inc)
Update an agent's incarnation.

Returns:
0 if unchanged, -1 if the incarnation is old, or 1 if the incarnation is new (which will invoke the callbacks in the caller's thread)

subscribe

boolean subscribe(MessageAddress addr,
                  IncarnationService.Callback cb)
Subscribe to incarnation change callbacks. Equivalent to subscribe(addr, cb, 0).

Returns:
true if the callback was not already subscribed

subscribe

boolean subscribe(MessageAddress addr,
                  IncarnationService.Callback cb,
                  long inc)
Subscribe to incarnation change callbacks with an initial minimal incarnation value filter.

The incarnation is used to restore a subscription after capturing it from getIncarnation(MessageAddress), specifically for mobile agents.

Returns:
true if the callback was not already subscribed

unsubscribe

boolean unsubscribe(MessageAddress addr,
                    IncarnationService.Callback cb)
Unsubscribe from incarnation change callbacks.

Returns:
true if the callback was subscribed

getSubscriptions

java.util.Map getSubscriptions()
Get a map of our subscriptions (addrs to callbacks).

Returns:
Map>MessageAddress, Set>Callback<<
